executable.title: Convert SPF coefficients to ODFs (represented by SH basis or discrete samples).
executable.description: Convert SPF coefficients to ODFs (represented by SH basis or discrete samples).\n\ Examples: \n\ SPFToODFConverter signalSPF.nii.gz odf.nii.gz --sh 8 --ra 4 --mdImage MD.nii.gz

image.name: _InputSPFFile
image.description: Input Image File represented by SPF basis.

integer-enumeration.name: _ODFOrder
integer-enumeration.description: ODF order. 2 for ODF with solid angle, 0 for Tuch ODF. -1 for ODF estimated based on Funk-Radon transform.

float.name: _BMax
float.description: Maximal b value for disk integral. If it is -1, it is a plan integral.

float.name: _Scale
float.description: Scale for SPF basis. If it is negative, the default value based on typical MD is used.

image.name: _MDImageFile
image.description: Mean diffusivity Image for adaptive scale.

integer.name: _NumberOfThreads
integer.description: Number of threads. If it not positive, then the default number for multiple threads is used.

float.name: _Tau
float.description: Tau value. The default is calculated based on 4*pi*pi*tau=1.
